text: aur jo vivaah ka avasar na pa rahe ho unhen chaahie ki paakadaamanee apanae rahen, yahaan tak ki allaah apane udaar anugrah se unhen samrddh kar de. aur jin logon par tumhen svaamitv ka adhikaar praapt ho unamen se jo log likha-padhee ke ichchhuk ho unase likha-padhee kar lo, yadi tumhen maaloom ho ki unamen bhalaee hai. aur unhen allaah ke maal mein se do, jo usane tumhen pradaan kiya hai. aur apanee laundiyon ko saansaarik jeevan-saamagree kee chaah mein vyavichaar ke lie baadhy na karo, jabaki ve paakadaaman rahana bhee chaahatee hon. aur isake lie jo koee unhen baadhy karega, to nishchay hee allaah unake baadhy kie jaane ke pashchaat atyant kshamaasheel, dayaavaan hai
